name: Silent In Space
description:
You wake up one morning, in front of an unusual character. It looks... Alien? Soon, you realize that you have been abducted! You need to escape from the space-ship, but you might need some help... Or you could erase these foreign monstres yourself.

Silent In Space is a textual game in the spirit of the first adventure games on microcomputers of the 70s (Colossal Cave Adventure...). Make friends from Aliens to achieve your goals, or slay them all for your planet and freedom.

To play this game, you will need a command prompt and java 14 or more installed. Please read the README.txt file for instructions.
